channel.title: Data does not lie, OURS DOES! - FakeJSON
channel.description:
Hi my name is Stan and we are working on DEV mocking service - [fakeJSON](https://fakejson.com)
FakeJSON helps you quickly generate fake data using its API. Make an API request describing what you want and how you want it. The API returns it all in JSON. It's that simple. Our long term mission is to speed up the go to market process for ideas and help you fake it till you make it.

item.title: Data does not lie, OURS DOES! - FakeJSON
item.dc:creator: rfctr
item.description:
So it is a service for creating mock services? Mind-blowing I did not even consider such a use-case existing.

Good luck with this!

Read full topic
item.source: Data does not lie, OURS DOES! - FakeJSON
